data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 3, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Victor Wolf awards Hacken a goal kick.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hacken's half?
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 6, Kalmar advance rapidly upfield but Victor Wolf blows for offside.
Hacken's Patrik Walemark gets in a shot on goal at Bravida Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hacken to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Kalmar.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Kalmar.
Kalmar's Piotr Johansson is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 11, Goal! Sebastian Ring gives Kalmar a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Piotr Johansson.
Free kick Hacken.
In the minute 13, Hacken are in shooting range from this free kick.
Hacken have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 16, Kalmar's Sebastian Ring gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hacken defender.
Romarinho (Kalmar) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Kalmar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hacken's half?
In the minute 17, Victor Wolf signals a Hacken throw-in in Kalmar's half.
Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
Throw-in Kalmar.
In the minute 20, Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Hacken.
In the minute 24, Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Goal kick for Kalmar at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 27, Kalmar to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Hacken.
Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 30, Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
Hacken have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 34, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kalmar's half?
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 38, Victor Wolf signals a Hacken throw-in in Kalmar's half.
Kalmar are coming forward and Douglas Bergqvist gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Hacken have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Kalmar drives forward and Piotr Johansson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Svante Ingelsson for Kalmar drives towards goal at Bravida Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 45, Isak Jansson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kalmar.
The first half has been concluded at Bravida Arena.
The second-half is now underway.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 46, Jasse Tuominen is replacing Adnan Maric for the home team.
Ahmed Yasin is on a sub for Patrik Walemark for Hacken.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Hacken.
Kalmar needs to be cautious. Hacken have an attacking throw-in.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 49, Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Gothenburg.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hacken push upfield but Victor Wolf quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 51, Kalmar pushes forward through Svante Ingelsson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Hacken.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
In the minute 53, Hacken to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
Free kick Hacken.
In the minute 55, Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jasse Tuominen for Hacken has been booked by Victor Wolf and receives a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to Kalmarâ€™s Svante Ingelsson and play has been suspended briefly.
Svante Ingelsson is back on his feet again.
In the minute 57, In Gothenburg Hacken drive forward through Jasse Tuominen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Victor Wolf awards Kalmar a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 61, Leo Bengtsson (Hacken) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, In Gothenburg Kalmar drive forward through Erik Israelsson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Leo Bengtsson of Hacken smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 69, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Hacken.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Nanne Bergstrand is making the team's first substitution at Bravida Arena with Filip Sachpekidis replacing Isak Magnusson.
In the minute 70, Kalmar's Romarinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Gustav Berggren (Hacken) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
In the minute 76, Victor Wolf signals a Hacken throw-in in Kalmar's half.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Svante Ingelsson with York Raphael.
In the minute 78, Piotr Johansson puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
In Gothenburg, Gustav Berggren of Hacken is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 80, Hacken drive upfield and Gustav Berggren gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kalmar defender.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hacken close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, Leonard Zuta of Hacken smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hacken's Alexander Soderlund gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Victor Wolf awards Kalmar a goal kick.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Godswill Ekpolo with Alexander Faltsetas. This is the third substitution made today by Andreas Alm.
Hacken make their fourth substitution with Adam Andersson replacing Gustav Berggren.
Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Kalmar.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In Gothenburg, Kalmar push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 89, Hacken drives forward and Jasse Tuominen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Hacken push forward at Bravida Arena and Leonard Zuta gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kalmar defence.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Gothenburg.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kalmar's half?
Kalmar's Fidan Aliti looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Hacken.
Victor Wolf signals a throw-in for Kalmar, close to Hacken's area.
Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
Fidan Aliti is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Edvin Crona is on a sub for Isak Jansson for Kalmar.
Fidan Aliti, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Johan Stenmark is the substitute for Kalmar.
